Articles.Content:
With KSP 1.0 Announced, and as squad has named their updates since the 0.23.5 ARM Patch. 0.24 First Contract, 0.25 Economic Boom, 0.90 Beta than ever, then what? This thread is intended for the KSP community to discuss ideas for the naming of the update.

When you give a suggestion for a name, please give reasoning behind it (optional).

To get things started off, my idea for the update is "The end of the beginning" as a slight spoof (or parody) of the phrase 'The beginning of the end' and how early access (represented as 'the beginning') will be over once 1.0 has been released.

NOTES: This is for the discussion of names only and is not by any means official. Any names suggested are are not guaranteed to even be considered by squad as names for the update.
I'm one of those people that think simply "Kerbal Space Program" would fit best for 1.0.
Yes, "Kerbal Space Program" is a fitting title for the game's complete release
I agree with the other posters that it should just be "Kerbal Space Program", but I'm rather fond of "Kerbal Space Program: Full Circle" with the obvious "complete orbit" reference

Kerbal Space Program 1.0: "Kerbal Space Program"? No, not likely happened.

Simply ksp 1.0 Ã¢â‚¬Å“Beyond BetaÃ¢â‚¬Å“, or Ã¢â‚¬Å“New BegainingÃ¢â‚¬Å“, possibly.

Or KSP 1.0: Hail the Ladies?
I'm in the "Kerbal Space Program" boat.
Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Go For Launch!
"Buggy bugger"?
I'm all for Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Full Circle.
Kerbal Space Program: Not Quite, But We're Shipping Anyway
Kerbal Space Program: Pandora's Box

Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Go For Launch!

Get's my vote.

For extra points, a picture of a big red button, with a warning sticker on it that says 'pushing this button may invalidate the warranty'.

Edited January 28, 2015 by pxi
Kerbal Space Program: Now With 50% More Explosions
Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Go Fever!
Kerbal Space Program: Aerodynamically unstable
KSP 1.0: Trust Us
KSP: 1.0 In-Name-Only.

Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Go For Launch!

Another thumbs-up from me! It is motivating and it has this "launch"-metaphor.

"Kerbal Space Program"

After all, isn't that what they are releasing?
"Out to launch"

I'm all for

Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Go For Launch!

But I gotta give my honorable mention to

Kerbal Space Program: Not Quite, But We're Shipping Anyway

JS

Kerbal Space Program: New Horizons

Anyone???

"Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Undercooked"

"Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Premature Delivery"

"Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Wrong Address"

"Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Oh Well..."

"Kerbal Space Program 1.0: Watch this!"

Some sarcastic suggestions.

Of the ones suggested so far, I mostly like "Out to Launch". However, I think that the 1.0 Release of the game should just be called "Kerbal Space Program".

If, on the other hand, there is a 0.99, or 1.0RC, or an Experimental release, then the name I'd suggest for it would be "All Systems Go".
Releaase the Kraken
